resources.string: Brony MLP Blind Bag Guide

My Little Pony G4 Blind Bag Guide 
Created with info from the MLPMerch.com Blind Bag Database. 
 
Visit MLPMerch.com for the online Blind Bag Database and MLP merch news!
Settings

Did you know that you can predict what an MLP blind bag will contain without opening it? 
We'll teach you all about it in this tutorial! 
 
Step 1: First you need to know which wave of blind bag you see in a store. In this app you can see which bag matches the one in your store. 
 
Step 2: Find the code on the blind bag (examples below): 
- Wave 1-7 blind bags have a seam on the back of the blind bag with a code, this code is either 2 or 5 numbers long. When you have a 5-number code, only read the 2nd and 4th number: #80216 is #01 and #82206 is #20. 
- Wave 8-11 blind bags have a 2-letter code on the bottom of the bag. 
 Step 3: Use this app to see which pony of the selected wave matches the code! 
 
Here are 2 examples:
This Wave 5 blind bag has code #70192 (#09), which is Rainbow Dash!
This Wave 9 blind bag has code AH, which is Shoeshine!

This application is made by FrankkieNL, Fluffikens and MLPMerch.com. 
The original (flash) application is made by Jaroslav Vozar. 
 
Images by:
 
MLPMerch.com, Elwyn, Breyer600, collec-jcg and StrawberryReef.

Welcome !
This application has been updated!\nFrankkieNL is now collaborating with MLPMerch.com to provide the most up-to-date Blind Bag information!
Wave 1 contains 24 figures, 3 of which are transparent with glitter.
Wave 2 contains 24 figures, 3 of which are transparent with glitter. (EU Only)
Wave 3 contains 24 figures, 3 of which are glow in the dark.
Wave 4 contains 24 figures, 3 of which are metallic.
Wave 5 contains 24 figures.
Wave 6 contains 24 figures, 3 of which have gem cutie marks.
Wave 7 contains 24 figures, all of which are transparent with painted hair.
Wave 8 contains 24 figures, all of which are transparent (neon) with painted hair.
Wave 8A contains 12 figures, all of which are transparent (neon) with painted hair. (UK Only)
Wave 8B contains 12 figures, all of which are transparent (neon) with painted hair. (UK Only)
Wave 9 contains 24 figures, 3 of which are rainbowfied ponies.
Wave 9A contains 12 figures, 1 of which is a rainbowfied pony. (UK Only)
Wave 9B contains 12 figures, 2 of which are rainbowfied ponies. (UK Only)
Wave 10 contains 24 figures, all are transparent with painted hair and glitter.
Wave 10A contains 12 figures, all are transparent with painted hair and glitter. (UK Only)
Wave 11 contains 24 figures.
Collection sets are special releases with a few figures, exclusive to a certain store.
Mini sets contain 3 to 6 characters based on a certain theme.
